attributes.action: Legislate to ban participants wearing face coverings at demonstrations
attributes.additional_details: Introduce legislation that would result in the arrest of any attendee of a demonstration/protest wearing face covering (ie a mask/balaclava) and removal from the scene.
attributes.background: Government should introduce legislation to make it an offence to attend a demonstration or counter-demonstration wearing face coverings. All participants should be showing their faces, or, be arrested so that they can be identified.
